name: Pedro Aimar
description: Pedro Aimar is a former algorithm coder forZetatech. He was fired by his employer after developing health issues due to hisALS, and them not wanting to cover for hisfull body conversion. Having found aRussiandoctor by the name of Stanislav Federov, who was willing to perform the procedure in Russia, Aimar was desperate for money.Wanting to take revenge on Zetatech while also making enougheddiesfor the procedure, Aimar put out a contract for anymercswanting to help him steal a truck full of Zetatech AV thrusters.
